Text.Page:
There is one who knows much of {@LinkCreature:13#300931#ghilliedhus}. Dulari, researcher and friend. As you travel to his campsite to the south, collect samples from those you fight.

Attack from the sides or behind...but keep moving. An angered ghilliedhu is nothing to trifle with.

I saw you had to defend yourself along the path. Odd behavior from such normally docile creatures, yes?

Ghilliedhus are protector spirits, not soldiers. I need answers...and samples...as to what's going on.

Another soldier. Kishale again, being "helpful." The samples you bring only reinforce my conclusions. This place must be studied, not conquered.

If you must fight, practice until you can face Vekas unafraid. I believe it agitates the other spirits, and understanding Vekas will reveal much more about this island than meaningless violence.
